pr_title: SWTBot Test case for FEA exports into HTML

timeline.message:
Fixed bug in destination field - (Task #757)

- Complete flag of HTML exporter was not set when setting the destinaton
via keyboard.

---
Task #757: SWTBot Test Case for Exporting FEA elements to HTML

Added test case for HTML exporter - (Task #757)

- Implemented test case for HTML exporter
- Extracted redundant code into general purpose methods for opening
import and export wizards

timeline.author: JAmmermann-DLR

timeline.bodyText: Just a question: We don't initilize destination, will this event always trigger before we want to access the variable?
timeline.author: JAmmermann-DLR

replies.bodyText: Primitive variables always have a default initialization. A boolean is initialized with false.
replies.author: SaMuellerDLR

timeline.bodyText: Is this comment stil relevant, should we move it into the function then?
timeline.author: JAmmermann-DLR

replies.bodyText:
Removed the open import menu comment.
Otherwise the comment is still valid.
